JobFullDesc: We are looking for a Senior Technical Artist to join us at Zynga Austin in creating Star Wars: Hunters™, a competitive arena combat game for the Nintendo Switch system and mobile devices. Star Wars: Hunters will bring players together to engage in thrilling, squad-based, multiplayer battles featuring a diverse array of distinctive new Star Wars characters.As a Senior Technical Artist, work alongside the Art Director and leads to manage and iterate pipelines. Support the artistic endeavors of the art team, while collaborating to create and innovate on workflow and pipeline improvements. Build graphical features, evaluate software, provide front-line art support, and generally facilitate the creation of AAA quality visuals.Main Responsibilities:R&D into cutting edge techniques for opportunities to push mobile and console visual boundaries and performance.Collaborate with art and other teams to hit or exceed key visual targets.Debug and resolve graphical issues over a wide range of supported devices.Build and improve tooling and pipelines to boost efficiency and quality among the art team. Such tooling will require scripting/coding in multiple environments.Profile and optimize visual effects, art assets, and the wider rendering pipeline.Develop and iterate on new and existing visual features from all phases of production.Create and maintain art team documentation to ensure the team has easy access to information.Evaluate new software and new art authoring techniques.Desired Skills and Experience:Shipped at least 1 AAA title as a Technical Artist or ArtistWorking knowledge of the following; Maya, 3DSMAX, Photoshop and substanceExperience with art asset optimization techniques and memory budgetsFamiliar with game pipelines and their restrictionsPositive can-do demeanor, standout colleagueApproachable, flexible, structured and responsibleComfortable working independently within a group environmentAbility to quickly learn new toolsGood understanding of the artist pipeline and workflowStrong problem-solving skills, along with a keen attention to detailSolid knowledge or experience with the Unreal engine or an equivalent proprietary game engineWhat We Offer You:Competitive salary, bonus plan, Zynga RSU’s (Restricted Stock Units), ESPP (Employee Stock Purchase Plan)401K Company Match ContributionMedical, dental, vision, EAP, life insurance, and disability benefitsVirtual mental health and neurodiversity support programsFamily planning support programGenerous paid maternity/parental leaveSubsidized Back-up child careDiscretionary Time Off policy for many employeesFlexible working hours on many teamsCulture of diversity and inclusion including employee resource groupsWork with cool people and impact millions of daily playersIf this sounds like you, we want to hear from you! Your passion and experience for building original games will be instrumental as we bring together a brand-new collective of developers to tackle next-generation thinking and innovative products.
